val:
• Contributed to the development of HackerBlocks - an online coding and assessment platform. Used for hosting coding contests and classroom program students evaluation and practice. Worked on Ember and Nodejs.
  • Contributed to the development of the programming courses platform - CB Online. Worked on Ember and NodeJs.
  • Building a static site generator using Gulp for the Coding Blocks website, which reduced the code changes required for content update by 80%. Used Handlebars to create reusable components and stored data in JSON.
